Package managers

Class CurrencyManager

java.lang.Object
managers.CurrencyManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Publisher
public class CurrencyManager extends Object implements Publisher
Class that handles operations tied with currencies.
Since:
22.06.2020.
Author:
Dimitrije Karanfilovic

  • Method Details

    • addCurrency

      public int addCurrency​(String currency, String balance)
      Function that adds new currency. notifyObservers() is called after currency is successfully added.
      Parameters:
      currency - currency abbreviation
      balance - string representation of the currency's balance
      Returns:
      number which indicates which message will be displayed.

    • countCurrencies

      public int countCurrencies() throws SQLException
      Function that counts how many currencies are there.
      Returns:
      number of currencies
      Throws:
      SQLException - if counting doesn't go like intended
